Entries.262213017/e 262213016/A AdvAbiFirstMine/: continue/7 13/farmer -100 -100 2 Abigail 7 12 0 Marlon 8 11 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiWeapons 5/skippable/fade/pause 400/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/emote Abigail 8/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 19 0/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 200/emote Abigail 8/pause 200/emote Marlon 40/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/faceDirection Abigail 2/pause 200/speak Abigail "@!#$b#Marlon is teaching me about weapons today."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Marlon "Choosing the appropriate weapon for your fighting style, as well as caring for it properly, is essential to succeeding as an adventurer."/pause 200/speak Abigail "I already know which one I want!#$b#He showed me a lava katana earlier!$1"/pause 200/emote Marlon 28/pause 200/speak Marlon "We'll... work up to that one.#$b#But you're making good progress with the basics."/pause 200/speak Abigail "What weapon do you like to use @?"/pause 200/quickQuestion What's your fighting style?#This sword I picked up off the ground works well enough.#I let my fists do the talking.#I've got a lava katana! It's loads of fun!#I like the precision I get with my dagger.#This club may look heavy but it gets the job done.#I can get some good hits in with my slingshot.#Oh I've just got this old purple thing I found in the desert.#May I present, THE INFINITY BLADE!(break)speak Abigail "Wow, did you find that in the mines?"(break)speak Abigail "That sounds... painful.$6"(break)speak Abigail "Awesome! We should totally train together!$1"(break)speak Abigail "And sneak up on enemies like an assassin? That's pretty cool.$1"(break)speak Abigail "Wow, how do you lug that thing around all day?$1"(break)speak Abigail "That looks kind of hard to aim, but at least you can use rocks for ammo!$1"(break)speak Abigail "I love the color! This might be my new favorite.$1"\speak Marlon "Hmm...#$b#Interesting."(break)speak Abigail "WOW! That thing looks powerful!$7"\speak Marlon "Incredible!#$b#That's a legendary weapon, @.#$b#I was not aware you were in possession of one!#$b#I would be honored to look it over sometime."/pause 200/emote farmer 20/pause 200/speak Abigail "I can't wait to get something cooler than this basic sword."/pause 200/speak Marlon "Speaking of that sword, have you been sharpening it regularly like I told you to?"/pause 300/speak Abigail "Uhh...$1"/pause 200/emote Marlon 28/pause 300/end/fade

Entries.262213018/e 262213017/A AdvAbiWeapons/p: continue/7 13/farmer -100 -100 2 Abigail 5 11 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiShop 7/skippable/fade/pause 200/emote Abigail 40/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 6 19 0/emote Abigail 16/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 100/speak Abigail "Hi @!"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 200/speak Abigail "Marlon's out right now.#$b#He wants me to get some practice managing guild operations, so I'm going to start handling the front desk sometimes.#$b#Gil's still here if something comes up that I don't know how to deal with yet.#$b#If I can prove I've got things under control here, I might even convince him to take a vacation for a change!$1#$b#He really needs one."/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Abigail "So, what do you need?"/pause 200/end/fade

Entries.262213020/e 262213019/A AdvAbiSpar/f Abi: continue/16 29/farmer 14 29 1 Abigail 17 29 3 Sam 15 28 2 Sebastian 16 28 2/addConversationTopic AdvAbiMtn 3/skippable/fade/pause 200/speak Sam "And that's when Abigail used the Earthbind scroll on the Roc!$1"/pause 200/speak Abigail "I wasn't expecting it to fail that save!$1"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Neither was I...$2"/pause 200/speak Sam "You should join our next game night @.#$b#Stuff like this happens all the time!$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/speak Abigail "Speaking of time, I've gotta run.#$b#See you guys later!$1"/pause 100/faceDirection Abigail 1/speed Abigail 5/move Abigail 10 0 1/warp Abigail -100 -100/pause 100/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/emote Sam 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 2/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Abigail's been very busy lately."/pause 200/speak Sam "Doing what? It's not exactly hopping around here.$2"/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Whatever it is, she's missed a several game nights, and she usually looks forward to those adventures.$2"/pause 200/speak Sam "Band practice too!$7#$b#Do you think something's wrong?$8"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "@, do you know what's going on?"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/emote farmer 40/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/emote Sam 8/pause 200/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection Sebastian 3/pause 200/speak Sam "She knows she can talk to us, right?$2#$b#We're her friends, after all."/pause 200/emote Sebastian 40/pause 200/speak Sebastian "Whatever it is...#$b#I'm sure she will when she's ready.$2"/pause 200/emote Sam 32/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/end/fade
